name: Hungry Ducks VR
description:
You just wanted to spent some time with your sandwich on your boat in the center of your favorite lake. But those nasty hungry ducks want to get to your lovely sandwich! Good thing your brought your trusty canon pistol with you to repel them.

The longer you can prevent the ducks from reaching your boat, the more points you get. Do this by steering your boat and shooting the ducks for extra points.

Features:

  • Tour the lake with your boat
  • Shoot different sizes of evil ducks
  • Look at your sandwich
  • Enjoy the vista

Have fun!

Created by: Max Angermüller & Felix T. Vogel

Notice: This is a Virtual Reality game created primarily for the HTC Vive.
